verses.1: Tua ciangin Jakob in a tapate sam a, “A hong tung ding hunte ah noteʼ tunga hong tung ding thu kong gen theih nadingin note hong kikhawm un.
verses.2: “Jakobʼ tapate aw, hong kikhawmin za unla, na pa Israelʼ thugen ngai un.
verses.3: “Reuben, nang pen ka ta upa, ka vangliatna le ka tacil na hi a, a kiphasak pen, a vanglian pen na hi hi.
verses.4: Tuihual bangin na kip kei dinga, na tung tuang kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka zi na luppih a, ka lupna na mindaisak hi.
verses.5: “Simeon le Levi, unau hi a, a hiam uh ngongtat nadingin a zang uh hi.
verses.6: Amauʼ kikhopna ah ka kihel kei dinga, amauʼ pawl tawh ka kizom kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a heh manun mi that uh a, kiphatsakna lungsim tawh amaute in mawlpih dingin bawngtalteʼ zagui a sat tat uh hi.
verses.7: Amauʼ sinsona lauhuai a, amauʼ hehna kihtakhuai hi. Samsiatna ngah ta uh hen! Jakob suante sungah amaute ka khenthang dinga, Israel sungah amaute ka thehthang ding hi.
verses.8: “Judah aw, na sanggamte in nang hong phat ding hi. Na galteʼ gawl na meek dinga, na sanggamte na mai ah hong kun ding uh hi.
verses.9: Judah pen humpinelkai tawh kibang a, a sa mat sa a nek khit ciangin a kua ah a ciahkik tawh kibang hi. Humpinelkai bangin kizia-in a lum suk hi. Kua in amah phawng ngam ding hiam?
verses.10: Judah in kumpi ciangkhut len tawntung dinga, a suan a khakte in zong ukna aana nei tawntung ding hi. Minam dangte in ama tungah siah puak dinga, zahtakna tawh ama mai ah kun ding uh hi.
verses.11: A sakol no leenggui ah khih a, a la no leenggui limci pen ah khih hi. Amah in a puante leenggahzu sungah sawp a, a puansilhte leenggahtui san sungah a sawp hi.
verses.12: Leenggahzu a dawndawnna in a mit san gega a, bawngnawi a dawndawnna in a ha pak hi.
verses.13: “Zebulun, tuipi gei ah teeng ding hi. Amah, teembaw khawlna mun suak dinga, Sidon ciang dongah a gamgi om ding hi.
verses.14: “Issakhar, a hat la tawh kibang a, van gik nih kikalah a lum hi.
verses.15: A tawlngakna mun hoih sa a, a leitang noptuak sa hi. Tua ahih ciangin van pua dingin a liangko niamsak a, sila bangin na kisemsak hi.
verses.16: “Dan in Israel minam dangte mah bangin a mite thu khen ding hi.
verses.17: Dan pen lampi ah gulpi hi dinga, sul gei ah gul gu nei hi ding hi. Sakolʼ khetul petin a tuang pa a nungkiat hi.
verses.18: “Nong hotkhiat ding ka ngak hi, Topa.
verses.19: “Gad pen a buluhte in buluh dinga, ahih hangin amah in amaute sulzuihkik ding hi.
verses.20: “Asherʼ lo ah an tampi piang dinga, amah in kumpi anlimte bawl ding hi.
verses.21: “Naftali, a kikhah sakhipi hi a, sakhi no suakkhiasak hi.
verses.22: “Josef, a gah pha hiang ahi hi. Ciktui gei-a om a gah pha hiang hi a, a hiangte kulh tungah zaam hi.
verses.23: Thal tawite in nakpi takin amah simin, amah thal tawh kap uh a, nasia takin gimsak uh hi.
verses.24: Ahih hangin ama thal liing loin om a, a khutte kizaptelsak hi. Jakobʼ Vanglian Paʼ khut (Israel Suangpi, Tuucingpaʼ min),
verses.25: nang hong huh ding na paʼ Pasian in tunga om vantung thuphate, nuai-a tui thukna sunga om thuphate, khawilevulh le tuletate, nangma tungah hong pia hi.
verses.26: Na paʼ thuphate pen tawntung mual lianteʼ thupha, tawntung mual neute sangin vanglian zaw hi. Tua thuphate Josefʼ lu tungah hong tung henla, a sanggamteʼ kiang panin a kituam koihpaʼ tungah hong tung tahen.
verses.27: “Benjamin, a ne bakbak keivom hi a, zingsangin a sa mat sa ne-in, nitakin a ngah sa teng hawm hi,” a ci hi.
verses.28: Hihte khempeuh pen Israel minam sawm le nihte ahi hi. Hih thute pen amau tawh a kituak ciatin a pa in amaute thupha pia-in a gente ahi hi.
verses.29: Tua ciangin Jakob in a tate thuhilhin amaute kiangah, “Kei, ka mipihte kiangah a kigawm ding ka hi ta hi. Kivui nading munin neih dingin Abraham in Hit mi Efronʼ tung panin a lo tawh a leikhop, Kanaan gam, Mamre nisuahna lamah a om Makpelah lo-a leihawm, Hit mi Efronʼ lo-a leihawm han sungah ka pate tawh hong vuikhawm un.
verses.31: Tua lai munah amaute in Abraham le a zi Sarah vui uh hi. Tua lai munah amaute in Isaac le a zi Rebekah vui uh hi. Tua lai munah keimah in Leah ka vui hi.
verses.32: Lo le tua sunga om leihawm Hit miteʼ tung panin a kilei ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.33: Jakob in a tapate thuhilh a man khit ciangin, a lupna tungah laitat a, a nunung pen a hu sang-in ama mipihte kiang a zuan ta hi.
